channel.title: Law in the news
channel.description:
This series focuses on current news stories that relate to the law.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Freedom of expression upon public questions
item.description: This program discusses more aspects of freedom of expression.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Law.

item.title: Consumer protection

item.title: Problems inherent in the transfer of power

item.dc:subject: Law.

item.title: Housing and urban development
item.description: This program focuses on housing and urban development in the "post-riot" era, through the prism of the law.
